participant_1.background:
I refuse to ride the bus.
My parents are both dead.
I find joy in the littlest things.
I listen to music for more than 5 hours a day.
I never work more than 4 days in a row.

participant_2.background:
I live in a bad neighborhood.
I worry about my image.
I worry about our neighbors yelling in the middle of the night.
I wish my mom was healthier.
I wish i could go to a better school.

content.text: I have a lot of fun things I like to do. I like to listen to music, I like to watch movies, and I like to play games. I also like to read books, and I like to go for walks. I love to spend time with my friends and family, and I love to make people laugh. I'm a very happy person, and I love to enjoy life.

I'm glad you're a happy person! I'm not so happy. I live in a bad neighborhood, and I worry about my image. I worry about our neighbors yelling in the middle of the night, and I wish my mom was healthier. I wish I could go to a better school.
I'm sorry to hear that you're not happy. I hope things get better for you. I'm sure you're a great person, and you deserve to be happy.
I'm here to listen if you ever need someone to talk to.
Thanks. I might take you up on that.
